about_the_game:
Build your own characters! The TIME ELEMENTS series is all about modular pieces: so you can customize your own RPG sprites. Swap outfits, hairstyles, armor, weapons, and more. The characters are fully animated: take your gameplay to the next level with four-directional action combat! And all with a high-quality pixel art style like your favorite RPG classics.

The first Time Elements Character Expansion pack has over 50 new modular pieces, so you can create more characters than you will need to fill an entire game world!

Contents:

* Fully compatible with the pieces from the Elements Character Core Set
* Build your own sprites with the updated Character Generator!
* Over 50 unique pieces that can create hundreds of characters
* Includes 5 premade heroes and premade cultist NPC sprites in multiple colors
* Animations in all four directions: walk, crouch, jump, attack, and others
* Includes extras from the original release, including the 27-page PDF guide, so you can start here without needing the core set.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
